name: ChrimTes
description:
A game about a bunch of housemates hunting for a Christmas Tree at the last second.

This game is intended as a satire on Christmas, consumerism, game quest design, England, and all sorts of pretentious nonsense!

I made every aspect of it, except where brands and copyrighted materials in the graphics are concerned. I did not make them and this game has NO affiliation with any brands or companies. This game is a PARODY!!!

This is an adventure game made in RPGMaker MV with no battling or fail states. It will take you around 10-40 minutes to complete depending on your gamer ability.

It contains foul language, mild gore and blood, one sexual reference, and copious amounts of English slang.

This game was made for the SVGS game jam and I had about 25 days to make everything - on top of full time work, obligatory end-of-year parties and family commitments. Therefore literally every single aspect of this game is RUSHED, right down to the concept itself. I'm still pleased with it though.

You can use the arrow keys to move, Enter or Z to interact with objects and talk to people, and Escape to access the menu.

You can also click to get around and press right-click to access the menu.

I hope you enjoy it and please check out my other games and the rest of the games in the game jam which are also epic!
